title: Lot of 8 T-206, Sweet Cap, Piedmont, Polar Bear [SOLD]
author: lesliewestbrook

posts.post_title: Lot of 8 T-206, Sweet Cap, Piedmont, Polar Bear [SOLD]
posts.post_content:
I have 8 T-206 cards for sale. Asking $150 OBO. Paypal only. 

Stone, Piedmont 150, Vg-ex, with slight paper loss on back
Bowerman, Piedmont 350, pr-fr, with creasing and slight paper loss 
Gibson, Sweet Cap., poor, rough top edge, heavy paper loss on back
Street, Piedmont 350, g-vg, OC, with very light crease on front, some scrapbook paper attached to back
Overall, Sweet Cap 150, poor, creasing, paper loss, missing corner
Nattress, Sweet Cap 350, pr-fr, crease, rounded corners
Rudolph, Polar Bear, g-vg, light staining
Sullivan, Piedmont 150, fair, light creasing, rounded corners, scrapbook paper stuck to back
